We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private MomersionIndicator _momersion;
// In Initialize()
_momersion = MOMERSION(symbol, minPeriod, fullPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_momersion.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMERSION Period", _momersion.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOMERSION Current", _momersion.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.momersion = self.MOMERSION(symbol, minPeriod, fullPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.momersion.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMERSION Period", self.momersion.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOMERSION Current", self.momersion.Current);
